entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
